Serialized Form

  • Package game

    • Class game.Game extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • levelTime

          int levelTime
          Variable used as time needed to complete the level

        • levelNum

          int levelNum
          Variable used to determine the number of selected level, also used as multiplier to levelTime, as to achieve different times need for completions of each level

        • player

          Player player
          An object created using Player class
          See Also:
          Player

        • shooter

          Shooter shooter
          An object created using Shooter class
          See Also:
          Shooter

        • gameState

          int gameState
          Variable used to determine in which part of the game the user is currently in 0-Menu, 1-Game, 2-Game-Over, 3-Congratulation screen, 4-Pause game

        • sprites

          java.util.ArrayList<E> sprites
          ArrayList of all the sprites visible on the screen other then Shooter and Player
          See Also:
          ArrayList

        • mainTimer

          javax.swing.Timer mainTimer
          Swing timer used as internal clock for the game
          See Also:
          Timer

        • livesNum

          int livesNum
          Variable holding number of lives the player has left

        • levelTimer

          int levelTimer
          Variable used to count seconds based on mainTimer

        • obstacleTimer

          int obstacleTimer
          Variable used to create new obstacles, based on mainTimer and spritesRandomTimer
          See Also:
          Obstacle

        • shooterTimer

          int shooterTimer
          Variable used to create new danger sign and bullet, based on mainTimer and shooterRandomTimer
          See Also:
          Danger, Bullet

        • timersOn

          boolean timersOn
          Boolean used to pause the timers if needed

        • shooterRandomTimer

          int shooterRandomTimer
          Variable used to determine at random when new danger sign and bullet is created

        • spritesRandomTimer

          int spritesRandomTimer
          Variable used to determine at random when new Obstacle is created

        • powerupRandomTimer

          int powerupRandomTimer
          Variable used to determine at random when new Powerup is created
          See Also:
          Powerup

        • menu

          Menu menu
          An object created using Menu class
          See Also:
          Menu

        • congratsScreen

          CongratsScreen congratsScreen
          An object created using CongratsScreen class
          See Also:
          CongratsScreen

        • shop

          Shop shop
          An object created using Shop class
          See Also:
          Shop

        • options

          Options options
          An object created using Options class
          See Also:
          Options

        • pause

          Pause pause
          An object created using Pause class
          See Also:
          Pause

        • gameOverScreen

          GameOverScreen gameOverScreen
          An object created using GameOverScreen class
          See Also:
          GameOverScreen

        • levels

          Levels levels
          An object created using Levels class
          See Also:
          Levels

        • sounds

          Sound sounds
          An object created using Sound class
          See Also:
          Sound

        • music

          Music music
          An object created using Music class
          See Also:
          Music

        • tutorial

          Tutorial tutorial
          An object created using Tutorial class

        • menuState

          int menuState
          A variable used to identify in which sub menu the user is currently in. 0-Main menu, 1-Level selection, 2-Options, 3-Shop

        • shieldOn

          boolean shieldOn
          Boolean used to determinate if the shield has been bought in shop.

    • Class game.Start extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

  • Package menus

    • Class menus.Button extends java.awt.Rectangle implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • font

          java.awt.Font font
          First font is the initiative font (before being selected)

        • selectedFont

          java.awt.Font selectedFont
          Second font, which would be used if we want to use a different font for our selected button.

        • color

          java.awt.Color color
          is the initiative color (before being selected)

        • selectedColor

          java.awt.Color selectedColor
          would be used if we want to use a different color for our selected button.

        • selected

          boolean selected
          Each button has a boolean "selected" if it's True then The program would compile the button in a different way (for example bigger font or some extra graphics)

        • text

          java.lang.String text
          The text for the button . it can be "PLAY" or anything that is specified during initializing the button at the main class

        • textY

          int textY
          The vertical position of the button

    • Class menus.LevelButton extends java.awt.Rectangle implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • selected

          boolean selected
          Each button has a boolean "selected" if it's True then The program would compile the button in a different way (for example bigger font or some extra graphics)

        • X

          int X
          The horizontal position of the button

        • Y

          int Y
          The vertical position of the button

        • text

          java.lang.String text
          The text for the button . it can be "Endless mode" or anything that is specified during initializing the button at the main class

        • font

          java.awt.Font font
          First font is the initiative font (before being selected)

        • selectedFont

          java.awt.Font selectedFont
          Second font, which would be used if we want to use a different font for our selected button.

        • color

          java.awt.Color color
          is the initiative color (before being selected)

        • selectedColor

          java.awt.Color selectedColor
          would be used if we want to use a different color for our selected button.

    • Class menus.ShopButton extends java.awt.Rectangle implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • selected

          boolean selected

        • item

          java.awt.Image item
          First item is the initiative item (before being selected)

        • selectemItem

          java.awt.Image selectemItem
          Second Item , it is only a bigger version of item image and should be drawn when the button is selected.

        • picX

          int picX
          The horizontal position of the button

        • picY

          int picY
          The vertical position of the button
